mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where your sense of entitlement is our top priority!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was, strolling into my favorite coffee shop, assuming the barista would not only remember my usual order but also have it ready the moment I walked in. To my horror, she had the audacity to ask me what I wanted! Outraged, I demanded to see the manager and made it clear that such incompetence was simply unacceptable. After a heated exchange, not only did I get my free coffee, but I also received a voucher for a month of complimentary drinks as compensation. Another day, another victory for Hot Josh!
